Cam korkuluk Temperli cam aynı ebattaki: Glass railing Tempered glass is produced by placing pvb (polyvinyl burital) between two glasses of the same size, so it does not scatter when broken. Taşıyıcı teker takımlarında kullanılan r: The bearings used in the carrier wheel assemblies must be coated with primary grade plastic made of glass-reinforced polyamide material to provide a quiet and comfortable rotation. All components used in the carrier wheel assemblies must be made of stainless steel (Stainless Steel - SS).
Sistemin taşıyıcı motoru; en az 120Nm ta: The carrier motor of the system must have a carrying capacity of at least 120Nm. The carrier motor of the system must be of European (Italy, France, Germany, etc.) origin. The motor movement transmission parts used in the system must be stainless or have a coating to prevent corrosion. The system must have a special stainless adjustment apparatus that allows the belt length to be adjusted.
Su tahliye delikleri en az 70mm uçlu mat: Water drainage holes should be drilled with at least 70mm drill bit through the original bearing in a way that will not visually damage the profile. In the system, in order to maximize insulation, there should be insulation brushes / seals at the joints of the rail profile and the awning, at the wall ends, in all working gaps between the rail and the panel. These elements should not prevent comfortable movement. The awning should move comfortably and silently during opening and closing. Side covers used in the system must be steel and stainless steel. Special plastic sealing washers or insulation product should be used at the bottom of the screws to prevent water leaks from the screw holes into the bottom wall.

Eşikli Sürgülü Cam Balkon Sistemleri: Sliding Glass Balcony Systems with Threshold
Eşikli Sürgülü Sistem yerden belli bir y: Threshold Sliding System is a system that can be used in projects where there is a certain height above the ground on the balustrades or in projects with high pedestrian traffic. It is a very easy-to-use system. In other glass balconies, especially women are uncomfortable with the heavy and glassy structure of the glass wings, especially when opening and closing them. For this reason, the Threshold Sliding System is more suitable for use in terms of this situation.
Eşikli Sürgülü Sistemlerde kullanılan tü: Thanks to the quality of the raw materials, you can use all the products used in Threshold Sliding Systems for many years without being affected by external weather conditions such as sun, rain, cold, and snow.
Eşikli Sürgülü Sistemlerde cam kanat tek: The frame profile (track profile) that ensures the upper guidance of the glass wing wheels in the Threshold Sliding Systems is produced and designed with five channels as a result of carefully conducted load carrying tests.
Cam Balkonlarımızda 8 mm kalınlığında ca: We use 8 mm thick glass in our glass balconies. This glass thickness is designed to achieve a perfect balance between durability and aesthetics. Option for glass in different colors.
Eşiksiz Sürgülü Sistem yerden belli bir: Frameless Sliding System is a system that you can use in projects with a certain height above the ground on balusters or in busy and non-passage projects. It is very easy to use. In other glass balconies, especially ladies are uncomfortable when opening and closing the glass wings because the wings are heavy and glass. Therefore, the Frameless Sliding System is a more suitable system for use in this sense.
Eşiksiz Sürgülü Sistemlerde kullanılan t: You can use all the products used in Frameless Sliding Systems for many years without being affected by external weather conditions such as sun, rain, cold, and snow, thanks to the quality of the raw materials.
Eşiksiz Sürgülü Sistemlerde cam kanat te: The frame profile (track profile) that ensures the upper guidance of the glass wing wheels in the Frameless Sliding Systems is produced and designed with five channels as a result of load carrying tests carried out with care.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistem Dünyada Muadili Olmay: Luxury Sliding System is our latest system added to our product range with Unrivaled, Patented Products Worldwide. Luxury Sliding System is used in flat, 90 and 135 degree angled structures. It is generally preferred in cafes, restaurants, and private detached houses. In addition, it can be automatically opened and closed via a motor controlled by your mobile phone, which is our optional, self-produced, self-designed system with a patent that belongs to us.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistemlerde kullanılan tüm ü: You can use all the products used in Luxury Sliding Systems for many years without being affected by external weather conditions such as sun, rain, cold, and snow, thanks to the quality of the raw materials.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistemde Kullanılan geniş ya: Thanks to the wide structure and lockable magnetic seal with a feature in Luxury Sliding System, it offers superior insulation properties by minimizing water, dust, and air permeability to the minimum levels.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistemde kullanılan kasa pro: The frame profile (track profile) used in the Luxury Sliding System has 3-way and 5-way rail options. Thanks to the double wheels on each panel, it is designed and produced to move balanced on the rail after the load carrying tests.
Cam Balkonlarımızda 6-8-10-20(4+12+4) mm: We use glass with a thickness of 6-8-10-20 (4+12+4) mm in our glass balconies. This glass thickness is designed to achieve a perfect balance between durability and aesthetics. Option for glass in different colors.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistemde kullanılan kasa pro: The frame profile used in the Luxury Sliding System has 14 filament channels in the 5-way system and 8 filament channels in the 3-way system, and in addition, there are 2 filament seals on each base. Thanks to this system, you can optionally benefit from superior insulation.
Lüx Sürgülü Sistemde kullanılan sineklik: Thanks to the fly screen profile used in the Luxury Sliding System, you can protect yourself from insects and flies and benefit from clean air.
Kolay Kullanımı İle Kontrol Sizin Eliniz: Easy Control Is In Your Hands
Comfort Slide PVC sliding door and windo: Comfort Slide PVC sliding door and window system with a specially designed 149 mm wide, 6-cavity frame and 76 mm wide wing profiles increases the insulation and sound insulation performance to a higher level compared to similar PVC sliding door and window systems. The specially designed hardware and the ability to apply triple glazing up to 52 mm minimize the thermal transmission coefficient value.
Comfort Slide PVC sürme kapı ve pencere: Comfort Slide PVC sliding door and window system, with a different perspective from all known sliding applications, was designed with international experience and professionalism gained from international experiences, aiming to provide more living space to the place used, as well as a much stronger ease of use and impermeability. The Comfort Slide sliding door and window system, with its aesthetic structure, provides maximum field of view while allowing different styles to be reflected in architectural projects.
Comfort Slide Sürme Sistemine özel olara: Thanks to the hardware specially designed for the Comfort Slide Sliding System, it offers a very easy and comfortable user experience in opening and closing functions. Winsa hardware, in harmony with the colors of the Comfort Slide Sliding System, provides an aesthetic appearance.
Comfort Slide PVC sürme kapı ve pencere: In the Comfort Slide PVC sliding door and window system, the specially designed 149 mm wide frame with 6 chambers and 76 mm wide sash profiles elevate the thermal and acoustic insulation performance to a higher level compared to similar PVC sliding door and window systems. The specially designed hardware and the ability to apply triple glazing up to 52 mm minimize the thermal transmittance coefficient value.

Türkiye’ye tek ve Winsa’ya özel olarak t: The Lotus Axial Sliding System, designed exclusively for Turkey and Winsa, has options with a 122 mm wide two-axis, 113 mm wide single-axis, and self-revealing frame. It provides optimum insulation value within sliding systems. With the use of double glazing up to 28 mm, it ensures thermal and sound insulation.
LOTUS Sürme Sistemi, Winsa’nın uzman kad: The LOTUS Sliding System, designed by Winsa's expert team with international experiences, offers a different perspective from known sliding systems. Since the wings are embedded in the frame, there is no protrusion of the wings to the outside. Lotus Eksenel Sürme Sistemine uyumlu tas: Easy-to-use hardware designed to be compatible with the Lotus Axial Sliding System is used. Winsa hardware provides an aesthetic look by perfectly matching the colors of the Lotus System.

With the large support plate chamber in the wing profile, it offers maximum resistance comfort against wind loads.
Panorama HS 76 sistemi düşük eşik talepl: The Panorama HS 76 system smoothly meets low threshold demands with a 20 mm high aluminum threshold profile. It allows panoramic visuality in areas where it is applied with its wide glass openings. 2-wing, 3-wing, and 4-wing applications can be made with the Panorama HS 76 system.
Panorama HS 76 sistem 3 metre genişliğin: The Panorama HS 76 system allows the construction of wings with a width of 3 meters and a weight of 300 kg. It can be increased to 400 kg with additional trolleys. Winsa hardware provides an aesthetic look by perfectly matching the colors of the Panorama HS 76 system.

Winkepenk pvc kepenk sistemleri uyguland: Winkepenk PVC shutter systems provide maximum sun control in the applied areas. Winkepenk Sistemleri farklı uygulama ve: Winkepenk Systems are PVC shutter systems that add magnificent visual richness to your home with different application and color options.
